titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 14901 Adelfa Drive in La Mirada, California, as the "Wayne Grisham Post Office".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1071)
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service, and Labor Policy .

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service, and Labor Policy Discharged.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Mr. Issa moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2158.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 353 - 1 (Roll no. 914).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service, and Labor Policy

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security

bill.summary: 6/13/2011--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 14901 Adelfa Drive in La Mirada, California, as the "Wayne Grisham Post Office."
